verbs.description: [ARG0: aston martin] [V: considers] [ARG1: flying in components changing ports to handle brexit aston martin] is considering flying in car components and moving more parts through uk ports other than dover to avoid possible border friction after britain leaves the european union its boss told reuters london stock exchange n a palmer united states britain london brexit jaguar land rover chief executive reuters europe aston uk aston martin brussels european union spain coventry sunderland andy palmer birmingham english gaydon prime minister theresa may dover
